ref.title: CO2 solubility in and physical properties for ionic liquid mixtures of 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium acetate and 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium bis(trifluoromethanesulfonyl)amide

components.name: 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium acetate
